description: Modifies a usage limit in a cluster. You can't modify the feature type or period of a usage limit.

parameters.name: UsageLimitId
parameters.description: The identifier of the usage limit to modify.

nested_items.name: UsageLimitId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the usage limit.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster with a usage limit.

nested_items.name: FeatureType
nested_items.description: The Amazon Redshift feature to which the limit applies.

nested_items.name: LimitType
nested_items.description: The type of limit. Depending on the feature type, this can be based on a time duration or data size.

nested_items.name: Amount
nested_items.description: The limit amount. If time-based, this amount is in minutes. If data-based, this amount is in terabytes (TB).

nested_items.name: Period
nested_items.description: The time period that the amount applies to. A weekly period begins on Sunday. The default is monthly.

nested_items.name: BreachAction
nested_items.description: The action that Amazon Redshift takes when the limit is reached. Possible values are:

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the resource tag.
